title: Game Progress Route
content:
hoose the first one, Mystic Carrion will consider getting your help for a task. He tells you about his servant by the name of Thrumbo who ran away. He is asking you to return the body to him, and you will be rewarded. Then, you will get the following options to respond:

First, tell me why he ran. His body? It sounds like you want him killed. Baldur's Gate is a big city/ A name's not much to go on. i might be able to help. For a fee, of course. I'll think about it. You've got a deal.

If you cho
